title: The Return of Batman
content: At first, I was excited to read this book. Grant Morrison Batman run, the death and return of the dark knight, was where I chose to seriously start my comic collection.

title: Nova Volume 1
content: Would I get the wacky cartoon Sam Alexander from the Ultimate Spider-Man cartoon, or would I get the stoic Nova that I remember reading a few years ago. I got neither.

title: Original Sin
content: Original Sin, was amazing to say nonetheless. It had me hooked from issue one, and very eager to see the what repercussions will unfold in the Marvel universe.

title: Death of Captain America
content: I must say that I was never really into Captain America, but it was this death that caused me to research his lore and why Steve Rogers became the inspirational Captain America.

title: DBZ: Battle of Gods
content: Battle of Gods was an enjoyable movie to say the least.  After 20 years, Dragonball Z still delivers quality content that is enjoyable to both long-time fans and new viewers.

title: Aldnoah Zero
content: Throughout the war between Mars and Earth, Aldnoah Zero delivers great action and story.  I had heard great things about this anime, and it did not disappoint.
